Scourge and his sweep companion=

h was slagged - was somewhat denser than Rodimus' protective table.

P!!!" Scourge fumed as he noticed that his prey elude him again.

o the hole in the floor Rodimus had  fallen through, the lights he shined d=

mbled again. 

Scourge looked over at two of the four other sweeps that had=

ck to the hole as he readied his weapons, "The rest of you are with me!"

ith  wicked grin he leaped into the hole, followed closly by the four remai=
